actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to remove the authority of the Agricultural Marketing Service to inspect apples.
short_title: Apple Red Tape Elimination Act of 2013

summary.text: Apple Red Tape Elimination Act of 2013 - Provides that the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA), through the Agricultural Marketing Service, shall have no authority to inspect apples prior to export.

titles.title: Apple Red Tape Elimination Act of 2013
A bill to remove the authority of the Agricultural Marketing Service to inspect apples.
